post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
IBM Canada has immediate openings for experienced SAP consultants in:

Netweaver (Portals, XI, CMDM, Basis)
MM/SRM/SCM

Project Management
BW

SEM (BCS and BPS)
APO

HR
PM/PLM

SD
FI/CO


Additional qualifications include at least two years' SAP implementation experience, ideally with two full project lifecycles; strong leadership, communication and interpersonal skills and an understanding of consulting services and industry best practices. The ability to travel extensively in Canada and the U.S. is required, while bilingualism (English/French) is a strong asset.

IBM Canada is also looking for great people with the following skills: ABAP; CRM; PP; PS; QM; WM; and Solution Architect.

Contact kboo@ca.ibm.com if you are qualified and interested.
post.title: IBM Canada is looking for SAP consultants
